name.ja: <ruby>帝<rt>てい</rt></ruby><ruby>王<rt>おう</rt></ruby>の<ruby>煌<rt>こう</rt></ruby><ruby>誕<rt>たん</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent Normal or Special Summons a Level 8 or lower monster face-up, send 1 monster from your field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 Level 5 or higher monster with 1000 DEF from your hand to your field in face-up Attack Position. Then, you can destroy 1 of those opponent's Normal or Special Summoned monsters.
